verses.verse: וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> sent יְהוֹשֻׁ֣עַ־ <S%H3091><s%> And Joshua בִּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נ֠וּן <S%H5126><s%> of Nun מִֽן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַשִּׁטִּ֞ים <S%H7851><s%> out of Shittim שְׁנַֽיִם־ <S%H8147><s%> two אֲנָשִׁ֤ים <S%H376><s%> men מְרַגְּלִים֙ <S%H7270><s%> to spy חֶ֣רֶשׁ <S%H2791><s%> secretly לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying לְכ֛וּ <S%H1980><s%> Go רְא֥וּ <S%H7200><s%> view אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְרִיח֑וֹ <S%H3405><s%> even Jericho וַיֵּ֨לְכ֜וּ <S%H1980><s%> went וַ֠יָּבֹאוּ <S%H935><s%> and came בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> the house אִשָּׁ֥ה <S%H802><s%> ess זוֹנָ֛ה <S%H2181><s%> into an harlot's וּשְׁמָ֥הּ <S%H8034><s%> named רָחָ֖ב <S%H7343><s%> Rahab וַיִּשְׁכְּבוּ־ <S%H7901><s%> and lodged שָֽׁמָּה׃ <S%H8033><s%> there

וַיֵּ֣אָמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> And it was told לְמֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king יְרִיח֖וֹ <S%H3405><s%> of Jericho לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold אֲ֠נָשִׁים <S%H582><s%> men בָּ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> Behold there came הֵ֧נָּה <S%H2008><s%> here הַלַּ֛יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> in hither to night מִבְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לַחְפֹּ֥ר <S%H2658><s%> to search out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> the country

וַיִּשְׁלַח֙ <S%H7971><s%> sent מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king יְרִיח֔וֹ <S%H3405><s%> of Jericho אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to רָחָ֖ב <S%H7343><s%> unto Rahab לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying ה֠וֹצִיאִי <S%H3318><s%> Bring forth הָאֲנָשִׁ֨ים <S%H376><s%> the men הַבָּאִ֤ים <S%H935><s%> that are come אֵלַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H413><s%> to you אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who בָּ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> to thee which are entered לְבֵיתֵ֔ךְ <S%H1004><s%> into thine house כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for לַחְפֹּ֥ר <S%H2658><s%> to search out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> all the country בָּֽאוּ׃ <S%H935><s%> for they be come

וַתִּקַּ֧ח <S%H3947><s%> took הָֽאִשָּׁ֛ה <S%H802><s%> And the woman אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁנֵ֥י <S%H8147><s%> the two הָאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <S%H376><s%> men וַֽתִּצְפְּנ֑וֹ <S%H6845><s%> and hid וַתֹּ֣אמֶר ׀ <S%H559><s%> them and said כֵּ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> after that בָּ֤אוּ <S%H935><s%> thus There came אֵלַי֙ <S%H413><s%> about הָֽאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H376><s%> the men וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not יָדַ֖עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> unto me but I wist מֵאַ֥יִן <S%H370><s%> not whence הֵֽמָּה׃ <S%H1992><s%> like

וַיְהִ֨י <S%H1961><s%> came הַשַּׁ֜עַר <S%H8179><s%> of the gate לִסְגּ֗וֹר <S%H5462><s%> And it came to pass [about the time] of shutting בַּחֹ֙שֶׁךְ֙ <S%H2822><s%> when it was dark וְהָאֲנָשִׁ֣ים <S%H376><s%> the men יָצָ֔אוּ <S%H3318><s%> went out לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יָדַ֔עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> I wot אָ֥נָה <S%H575><s%> where הָלְכ֖וּ <S%H1980><s%> went הָֽאֲנָשִׁ֑ים <S%H376><s%> the men רִדְפ֥וּ <S%H7291><s%> not pursue מַהֵ֛ר <S%H4118><s%> them quickly אַחֲרֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H310><s%> after כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for תַשִּׂיגֽוּם׃ <S%H5381><s%> for ye shall overtake

וְהִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> she הֶעֱלָ֣תַם <S%H5927><s%> But she had brought them up הַגָּ֑גָה <S%H1406><s%> to the roof וַֽתִּטְמְנֵם֙ <S%H2934><s%> of the house and hid בְּפִשְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H6593><s%> of flax הָעֵ֔ץ <S%H6086><s%> them with the stalks הָעֲרֻכ֥וֹת <S%H6186><s%> which she had laid in order לָ֖הּ עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַגָּֽג׃ <S%H1406><s%> upon the roof

וְהָאֲנָשִׁ֗ים <S%H376><s%> the men רָדְפ֤וּ <S%H7291><s%> pursued אַֽחֲרֵיהֶם֙ <S%H310><s%> after דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> them the way הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <S%H3383><s%> to Jordan עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> unto הַֽמַּעְבְּר֑וֹת <S%H4569><s%> unto the fords וְהַשַּׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> the gate סָגָ֔רוּ <S%H5462><s%> they shut אַחֲרֵ֕י <S%H310><s%> after כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> them יָצְא֥וּ <S%H3318><s%> them were gone out הָרֹדְפִ֖ים <S%H7291><s%> and as soon as they which pursued אַחֲרֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H310><s%> after that

וְהֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like טֶ֣רֶם <S%H2962><s%> now before יִשְׁכָּב֑וּן <S%H7901><s%> And before they were laid down וְהִ֛יא <S%H1931><s%> she עָלְתָ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> she came up עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> up עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> to הַגָּֽג׃ <S%H1406><s%> unto them upon the roof

וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> And she said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָ֣אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H376><s%> the men יָדַ֕עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> I know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for נָתַ֧ן <S%H5414><s%> hath given יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD לָכֶ֖ם אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> you the land וְכִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> of you נָפְלָ֤ה <S%H5307><s%> is fallen אֵֽימַתְכֶם֙ <S%H367><s%> and that your terror עָלֵ֔ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> and וְכִ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for נָמֹ֛גוּ <S%H4127><s%> faint כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יֹשְׁבֵ֥י <S%H3427><s%> upon us and that all the inhabitants הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land מִפְּנֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H6440><s%> because

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for שָׁמַ֗עְנוּ <S%H8085><s%> For we have heard אֵ֠ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> how הוֹבִ֨ישׁ <S%H3001><s%> dried up יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> how the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֵ֤י <S%H4325><s%> the water יַם־ <S%H3220><s%> sea סוּף֙ <S%H5488><s%> of the Red מִפְּנֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H6440><s%> for you בְּצֵאתְכֶ֖ם <S%H3318><s%> when ye came out מִמִּצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וַאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> and what עֲשִׂיתֶ֡ם <S%H6213><s%> and what ye did לִשְׁנֵי֩ <S%H8147><s%> unto the two מַלְכֵ֨י <S%H4428><s%> kings הָאֱמֹרִ֜י <S%H567><s%> of the Amorites אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who בְּעֵ֤בֶר <S%H5676><s%> that [were] on the other side הַיַּרְדֵּן֙ <S%H3383><s%> Jordan לְסִיחֹ֣ן <S%H5511><s%> Sihon וּלְע֔וֹג <S%H5747><s%> and Og אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom הֶחֱרַמְתֶּ֖ם <S%H2763><s%> whom ye utterly destroyed אוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

וַנִּשְׁמַע֙ <S%H8085><s%> And as soon as we had heard וַיִּמַּ֣ס <S%H4549><s%> did melt לְבָבֵ֔נוּ <S%H3824><s%> [these things] our hearts וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> and no קָ֨מָה <S%H6965><s%> neither did there remain ע֥וֹד <S%H5750><s%> any ר֛וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> any more courage בְּאִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> in any man מִפְּנֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H6440><s%> because כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of you for the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> your God ה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> He אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> he [is] God בַּשָּׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> in heaven מִמַּ֔עַל <S%H4605><s%> above וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and on הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and in earth מִתָּֽחַת׃ <S%H8478><s%> Thahash

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> Now הִשָּֽׁבְעוּ־ <S%H7650><s%> Now therefore I pray you swear נָ֥א <S%H4994><s%> please לִי֙ בַּֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> unto me by the LORD כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> since עָשִׂ֥יתִי <S%H6213><s%> I have shewed עִמָּכֶ֖ם <S%H5973><s%> with חָ֑סֶד <S%H2617><s%> you kindness וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֨ם <S%H6213><s%> that ye will also shew גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> you also אַתֶּ֜ם <S%H859><s%> you עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with בֵּ֤ית <S%H1004><s%> house אָבִי֙ <S%H1><s%> unto my father's חֶ֔סֶד <S%H2617><s%> kindness וּנְתַתֶּ֥ם <S%H5414><s%> and give לִ֖י א֥וֹת <S%H226><s%> token אֱמֶֽת׃ <S%H571><s%> me a true

וְהַחֲיִתֶ֞ם <S%H2421><s%> And [that] ye will save alive אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָבִ֣י <S%H1><s%> my father וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אִמִּ֗י <S%H517><s%> and my mother וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַחַי֙ <S%H251><s%> and my brethren וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> [אַחֹותַי כ] (אַחְיֹותַ֔י <S%H269><s%> other ק) וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who לָהֶ֑ם וְהִצַּלְתֶּ֥ם <S%H5337><s%> and all that they have and deliver אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַפְשֹׁתֵ֖ינוּ <S%H5315><s%> our lives מִמָּֽוֶת׃ <S%H4194><s%> from death

וַיֹּ֧אמְרוּ <S%H559><s%> answered לָ֣הּ הָאֲנָשִׁ֗ים <S%H376><s%> the men נַפְשֵׁ֤נוּ <S%H5315><s%> her Our life תַחְתֵּיכֶם֙ <S%H8478><s%> Thahash לָמ֔וּת <S%H4191><s%> for yours אִ֚ם <S%H518><s%> if לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not תַגִּ֔ידוּ <S%H5046><s%> if ye utter אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דְּבָרֵ֖נוּ <S%H1697><s%> not this our business זֶ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> shall come בְּתֵת־ <S%H5414><s%> hath given יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> And it shall be when the LORD לָ֙נוּ֙ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> us the land וְעָשִׂ֥ינוּ <S%H6213><s%> that we will deal עִמָּ֖ךְ <S%H5973><s%> with חֶ֥סֶד <S%H2617><s%> kindly וֶאֱמֶֽת׃ <S%H571><s%> and truly

וַתּוֹרִדֵ֥ם <S%H3381><s%> Then she let them down בַּחֶ֖בֶל <S%H2256><s%> by a cord בְּעַ֣ד <S%H1157><s%> through הַֽחַלּ֑וֹן <S%H2474><s%> the window כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for בֵיתָהּ֙ <S%H1004><s%> for her house בְּקִ֣יר <S%H7023><s%> [was] upon the town הַֽחוֹמָ֔ה <S%H2346><s%> wall וּבַֽחוֹמָ֖ה <S%H2346><s%> upon the wall הִ֥יא <S%H1931><s%> she יוֹשָֽׁבֶת׃ <S%H3427><s%> and she dwelt

וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And she said לָהֶם֙ הָהָ֣רָה <S%H2022><s%> you to the mountain לֵּ֔כוּ <S%H1980><s%> Go פֶּֽן־ <S%H6435><s%> so יִפְגְּע֥וּ <S%H6293><s%> meet בָכֶ֖ם הָרֹדְפִ֑ים <S%H7291><s%> lest the pursuers וְנַחְבֵּתֶ֨ם <S%H2247><s%> you and hide שָׁ֜מָּה <S%H8033><s%> there שְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> yourselves there three יָמִ֗ים <S%H3117><s%> days עַ֚ד <S%H5704><s%> until שׁ֣וֹב <S%H7725><s%> be returned הָרֹֽדְפִ֔ים <S%H7291><s%> until the pursuers וְאַחַ֖ר <S%H310><s%> and afterward תֵּלְכ֥וּ <S%H1980><s%> may go לְדַרְכְּכֶֽם׃ <S%H1870><s%> your way
